Title: Repeals provision of vehicle and traffic law relating to periodic inspections of police vehicles
Summary: Relates to periodic inspections of police vehicles; removes exemption for police vehicles for periodic inspections.
LawCode: Rpld ยง308 sub 6, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivision 6 of section 308 of the vehicle and traffic law, relating to periodic inspections for police vehicles
